interval.description: ICMPv6 interval for sending a specified number of ICMPv6 token buckets.

echo-reply.description: Enable/disable sending enabling of echo reply packets.

black-list-flag.description: Enable/disable the function enabled IPv6 blacklist packet permit.

too-big-limit-flag.description: Enable/disable the function enabled toobig packet process rate limit.

permit-incomplete-fragment.description: Enable/disable global flag of allowing first fragment with incomplete IPv6 header chain.

reassemble-timeout.description: The timeout for the split packets reorganization.

icmp6-pkt-switch.description: Configure the ICMPv6 packet sending and receiving switch. All-famous is enabled by default. When matching, a single type of configuration is preferred, followed by an all-famous configuration.

all-famous-send-switch.description: Switches for all famous send types. But, the configuration in node each-type-switch will be used first, if it exists. Refer to the definition in type icmp6-name-type for the scope of all-famous send types.

all-famous-receive-switch.description: Switches for all famous receive types. But, the configuration in node each-type-switch will be used first, if it exists. Refer to the definition in type icmp6-name-type for the scope of all-famous receive types.

each-type-switchs.description: List of switches of a single ICMPv6 type.

each-type-switch.description: Configure switch for single ICMPv6 type list.

extension-header-filter-globals.description: Configure global IPv6 extension header filter configurations.

hop-by-hop-switch.description: Configure the IPv6 packet with hop-by-hop options extension header switch.

all-options.description: All options of IPv6 extension header switch.

options.description: List of some options of IPv6 extension header switch.

option.description: Configure some options of IPv6 extension header switch.

option-code.description: Option code of IPv6 extension header.

routing-switch.description: Configure the IPv6 packet with routing options extension header switch.

exh-type.description: IPv6 extension header type which have no option.

ipv6-stat.description: Statistics of querying for the statistics on IPv6 packets.

local-snd.description: Count of packets that are sent out locally.

discard-snd.description: Count of discarded packets due to the limit of sending rate.

fragment-fail.description: Count of packet fragments that fail to be sent.

local-rcv.description: Count of packets that are received locally.

hop-exceed-rcv.description: Count of received packets whose number of hops exceeds the upper limit.

head-err-rcv.description: Count of packets whose headers are incorrect.

routfail-rcv.description: Count of received packets whose routes are unreachable.

addrerr-rcv.description: Count of received packets with incorrect addresses.

protoerr-rcv.description: Count of received packets whose protocols are incorrect.

opterr-rcv.description: Count of received packets whose options are incorrect.

reassed-rcv.description: Count of received packets that are reassembled.

reass-timeout-rcv.description: Count of received packets whose reassembling is timeout.

hop-by-hop-option.description: Count of received packets whose extension headers are Hop-by-Hop options.

mobility-option.description: Count of received packets whose extension headers are mobility header.

dest-option.description: Count of received packets whose extension headers are destination options.

routing-option.description: Count of received packets whose extension headers are routing header.

auth-option.description: Count of received packets whose extension headers are authentication header.

encap-option.description: Count of received packets whose extension headers are encapsulation header.

no-header.description: Count of received packets without any packet header after extension headers.

tlv-length-error.description: Count of received packets whose options length are incorrect.

opt-length-error.description: Count of received packets whose extension headers length are incorrect.

opt-unknown.description: Count of received packets whose extension headers type are incorrect.

type-unknown.description: Count of received packets whose options type are incorrect.

para-pro-rcv.description: Count of received ICMPv6 message packets is incorrect.
